name: 最大化倾向量表调查
description: 衡量选择最佳选项目标的量表。
instructions: 对于所有问题，请选择以下选项之一
reference: Dalal, D., Diab, D., Zhu, X., & Hwang, T. (2015). Understanding the Construct of Maximizing Tendency: A Theoretical and Empirical Evaluation. Journal of Behavioral Decision Making, 28(5), 437–450. https://doi.org/10.1002/bdm.1859
